text: Raimundo García (27 May 1936 – 13 October 2020) was an Argentine chess master. He was born in Buenos Aires.Welcome to the Chessmetrics site García won at Mar del Plata 1962 (Torneo Latino-americano),BrasilBase and was Argentine Champion in 1963. In 1963 he won a match against Samuel Schweber (3 : 2) in Buenos Aires, tied for 7-9th at Fortaleza 1963 (zonal, Rossetto won), and took 10th at Buenos Aires 1964 (Paul Keres won). Garcia died on 13 October 2020 in Buenos Aires, aged 84.Adiós Maestro Raimundo Garcia ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chess players Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Raimundo Garcia
